archetypes.name: Forge Cleric
archetypes.previewtext:
Bonus Spells: Searing Smite, Shield. 
Heavy Armor Proficiency. Create one magic armor or weapon.

1.featuretextwithbullet: New Forge Domain spells, Searing Smite and Shield, added to app spell list.

Blessing of the Forge: At the end of a long rest, you can designate one weapon or suit of armor as a +1 magic item. This lasts until your next long rest, and you can only affect one item per long rest.

2.featuretextwithbullet:
Channel Divinity - Artisan's Blessing: You can use your Channel Divinity feature at the beginning of a short rest to craft an item that is partially metal. The object can be worth no more than 100gp, and you must expend materials equal to the item's worth to craft it. 
You can duplicate nonmagical items exactly if you have the original.

3.featuretextwithbullet: New Forge Domain spells, Heat Metal and Magic Weapon, added to app spell list.

5.featuretextwithbullet: New Forge Domain spells, Elemental Weapon and Protection From Energy, added to app spell list.

6.featuretextwithbullet:
Soul of the Forge:
- +1 AC while wearing medium or heavy armor.
- Resistance to fire damage.
- When you hit a construct with an attack, deal extra force damage equal to your cleric level.

7.featuretextwithbullet: New Forge Domain spells, Fabricate and Wall of Fire, added to app spell list.

8.featuretextwithbullet: Divine Strike: Once per turn when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can deal an extra 1d8 fire damage.

9.featuretextwithbullet: New Forge Domain spells, Animate Objects and Creation, added to app spell list.

17.featuretextwithbullet: Saint of Forge and Fire: You have immunity to fire damage, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons while wearing heavy armor.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Divine Strike: Once per turn when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can deal an extra 2d8 fire damage.
